description: Vegan buttermilk biscuits are the perfect side dish to any family dinner. With only a few ingredients (that you probably already have!) this easy biscuit recipe comes together in less than 10 minutes!
name: Vegan Buttermilk Biscuits
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons vegan butter, (I use Earth Balance)
1 cup soy milk, (plus more for brushing)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.

In a larger bowl combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Add the butter in small cubes and mix it in with the dough using your fingers until small pea-sized pieces have formed. Set aside.
In a small bowl whisk together the soy milk and the apple cider vinegar. Let it curdle for 5 minutes to make vegan buttermilk.
Create a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the buttermilk. Stir it together with a wooden spoon.

Once the dough comes together, turn it onto a floured surface and roll out to about 3/4 inch thick. With a 4" circle cutter cut out biscuits and place them on the prepared baking sheet. Brush tops with extra soy milk and bake them for 12-15 minutes, until lightly golden brown.
